New Records: Jaden Hardy is shooting 55.6% from beyond the 3-point line over the last two weeks
Key Match Events: Mavericks win over the Portland Trail Blazers with Jaden Hardy scoring a season-high 25 points
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Jason Kidd says Jaden Hardy is'starting to get into a groove' on the offensive end
Post-Match Reflections: Jaden Hardy attributes his uptick in offense to consistent preparation and extra work
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks are 10-4 when Jaden Hardy scores at least 10 points
Jaden Hardy is averaging 8.2 points on a career-high 44% shooting from the field in his third NBA season
Others: Chauncey Billups, the opposing coach, mentioned Jaden Hardy as a player who could be looking to prove himself with Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving sidelined
